metadata.name: Rooye' nahan (means: hidden face)
metadata.description:
name of work : 
Rooye' nahan
(means: hidden face)
(Made with silver)

A conceptual artwork
with an impression of Persian carpets and the women who weave them. 
 
Several manual techniques are used in this work, which include:
Making ornaments manually and traditional، Turquoise stone and hand cut،
The art of carpet design and engraving on metals، Use texture، 
And the old and obsolete art of  lay up (Layechini) that is painted with clay، and 
The art of cutting wood and shells. 

This is a unique edition and will never be repeated. 

In addition to NFT, original art jewelry is also sold and will be sent within a maximum period of one month.

size: 16/15.5
weight: 90 g.
